import React from 'react' import clasees from './MealItem.module.css' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../../Store/CartContext' export default function MealItem(props) { const cartCxt = useContext(CartContext) const price = `$${props.price}` console.log(cartCxt.items) console.log(props.price) const addToCartHandler = (amount) => { cartCxt.items.addItem({ id: props.id, name : props.name, amount : amount, price : props.price }) } return (

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • ) }
